| History                 = The New Juarez Cartel were one of the largest drug syndicates in the world. They were smuggling narcotics through La Guardia using drug mules. It hired [[Coyote (Earth-616)|Coyote]] who used the teleportation powers of his prisoner [[Johnathon Ohnn (Earth-616)|Spot]] to give drug mules (pregnant women) the ability to carry vastly more drugs than they normally could. Bringing in enough product to eliminate local rivals. They then hired him to off their competitors in NY City.{{r|Daredevil Vol 3 20}}
